title: Mint
description: A personal finance app that helps college students track their spending, create budgets, and manage their money.

title: Khan Academy - Personal Finance
description: Free online courses and tutorials on personal finance topics, including budgeting, investing, credit, and taxes, designed for college students.

title: Nerd Wallet
description: A personal finance website that provides college students with resources and tools to manage their money, including credit cards, loans, and insurance.

title: Goodbudget
description: A budgeting app that uses the envelope budgeting method to help college students track their expenses and save money.

title: Student Loan Hero
description: A website that provides college students with resources and tools to manage their student loans, including repayment options and debt consolidation.

title: Investopedia
description: A financial education website that offers college students a wealth of information and resources on investing, personal finance, and financial markets.

title: Federal Student Aid
description: The official website of the U.S. Department of Education's office that provides information and resources on federal student aid, including loans, grants, and scholarships.

title: Credit Karma
description: A free personal finance platform that helps college students monitor their credit scores, understand their credit reports, and improve their financial health.

title: Debt.com
description: A comprehensive resource for college students on managing and eliminating debt, including student loans, credit cards, and other financial obligations.

title: Acorns
description: A micro-investing app that helps college students save and invest small amounts of money automatically, promoting a habit of regular saving and investing.

title: CFPB - Consumer Financial Protection Bureau
description: A government agency that provides college students with resources and tools to help them make informed financial decisions, including budgeting, credit, and student loans.

title: Budgeting for College Students
description: A comprehensive guide from the American Institute of CPAs (AICPA) on creating and managing a budget as a college student, including tips on saving, spending, and avoiding debt.

title: Unbury.me
description: A debt repayment calculator and tool that helps college students develop a plan to pay off their student loans and other debts more efficiently.

title: Turbo Tax
description: A tax preparation software that offers college students easy-to-use tools and resources to file their tax returns, claim deductions, and maximize their refunds.

title: Scholarships.com
description: A comprehensive website that helps college students find and apply for scholarships, grants, and other financial aid opportunities to fund their education.

title: Edvisors
description: A website that provides college students and their families with information and resources on student loans, financial aid, and college planning.

title: Gen Z Money
description: A personal finance website and community specifically designed to help Generation Z (college-aged) individuals manage their money, build wealth, and achieve financial independence.

title: EVERFI
description: A digital learning platform that offers college students interactive courses and resources on financial education, including budgeting, credit, and student loans.

title: Grad Money Matters
description: A website that provides graduate students with information and resources on financial topics specific to their stage of life, such as managing student debt, budgeting, and career planning.

title: CFPB Students
description: A section of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau's website dedicated to providing college students with information and tools to help them make informed financial decisions.

title: Student Loan Genius
description: A platform that helps college students and graduates manage and optimize their student loan repayment, including refinancing and consolidation options.

title: Personal Finance for College Students
description: A comprehensive guide from the University of Illinois Extension that covers a wide range of personal finance topics for college students, including budgeting, credit, and retirement planning.

title: Fidelity Investments - College Students
description: A section of the Fidelity Investments website dedicated to providing college students with resources and tools to help them manage their money, invest, and plan for the future.

title: Payoff
description: A financial technology company that offers college students a mobile app and resources to help them pay off debt, improve their credit, and achieve their financial goals.

title: Stash
description: A mobile investment app that makes it easy for college students to start investing small amounts of money, with educational resources to help them learn about investing.

title: Student Loan Planner
description: A website that provides college students and graduates with personalized advice and tools to help them optimize their student loan repayment strategy.

title: Budgeting for College Students
description: A guide from the Federal Trade Commission that offers college students practical tips and advice on creating and sticking to a budget, managing credit, and avoiding financial pitfalls.

title: Kiplinger
description: A financial media company that provides college students with articles, tools, and resources on a wide range of personal finance topics, including investing, saving, and tax planning.

title: Mint Bills
description: A mobile app from Mint that helps college students manage their bills and payments, track their spending, and stay on top of their financial obligations.

title: Payback
description: A financial literacy program from the Lumina Foundation that provides college students with interactive tools, resources, and education to help them make informed decisions about paying for college, managing student loans, and achieving financial success.
